Title: Increases the weight limits for vehicles powered primarily by electric battery power and other fuels
Summary: Provides that a vehicle or a combination of vehicles operated by an engine fueled primarily by means of natural gas, propane gas, or hydrogen or powered primarily by means of electric battery power may exceed certain weight limits by up to two thousand pounds.
LawCode: Amd ยง385, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing weight limits for vehicles powered primarily by electric battery power and other fuels
